# Topo Wallpapers

Each area of interest below has a wallpaper for each combination of color (dark or green), w/ w/o the AllTrails logo, and screen size (phone, laptop).

## Hacking

Install dependencies:

```bash
npm install
```

Create background images:

```bash
node index.js
```

If the image is already present in the `/images` directory, then it will be skipped. To add a new area just edit locations.js adding a new entry using the correct latitude, longitude, and zoom level. ü§òüèª
